text: Nicholas Antony "Nicky" Scaife (born 14 May 1975) is an English former professional footballer who played as a midfielder in the Football League for York City, and in non-League football for Guisborough Town, Whitby Town, Pickering Town and Gateshead. ==References== Category:1975 births Category:Living people Category:Footballers from Middlesbrough Category:English footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Guisborough Town F.C. players Category:Whitby Town F.C. players Category:York City F.C. players Category:Pickering Town F.C. players Category:Gateshead F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: Nicky Scaife
